1. CreateTerm Test (1)
Terms of f : 3
f = -4x^3+2.3x^2-3
Terms of g : 4
g = 3x^4-4x^3+5x^2-4
g (creating a new term) = 2x^5+3x^4+1x^2
Terms of new g : 3
2. CreateTerm Test (2) : stress test of capacity
a = 1x^9+1x^8+1x^7+1x^6+1x^5+1x^4+1x^3+1x^2+1x^1+1
Term / Capacity of a : 10 10
a = 1x^10+1x^9+1x^8+1x^7+1x^6+1x^5+1x^4+1x^3+1x^2+1x^1+1
Term / Capacity of new a : 11 20
b = 1000x^999+999x^998+998x^997+997x^996+996x^995+995x^994+994x^993+993x^992+992x^991+991x^990+990x^989+989x^988+988x^987+987x^986+986x^985+985x^984+984x^983+983x^982+982x^981+981x^980+980x^979+979x^978+978x^977+977x^976+976x^975+975x^974+974x^973+973x^972+972x^971+971x^970+970x^969+969x^968+968x^967+967x^966+966x^965+965x^964+964x^963+963x^962+962x^961+961x^960+960x^959+959x^958+958x^957+957x^956+956x^955+955x^954+954x^953+953x^952+952x^951+951x^950+950x^949+949x^948+948x^947+947x^946+946x^945+945x^944+944x^943+943x^942+942x^941+941x^940+940x^939+939x^938+938x^937+937x^936+936x^935+935x^934+934x^933+933x^932+932x^931+931x^930+930x^929+929x^928+928x^927+927x^926+926x^925+925x^924+924x^923+923x^922+922x^921+921x^920+920x^919+919x^918+918x^917+917x^916+916x^915+915x^914+914x^913+913x^912+912x^911+911x^910+910x^909+909x^908+908x^907+907x^906+906x^905+905x^904+904x^903+903x^902+902x^901+901x^900+900x^899+899x^898+898x^897+897x^896+896x^895+895x^894+894x^893+893x^892+892x^891+891x^890+890x^889+889x^888+888x^887+887x^886+886x^885+885x^884+884x^883+883x^882+882x^881+881x^880+880x^879+879x^878+878x^877+877x^876+876x^875+875x^874+874x^873+873x^872+872x^871+871x^870+870x^869+869x^868+868x^867+867x^866+866x^865+865x^864+864x^863+863x^862+862x^861+861x^860+860x^859+859x^858+858x^857+857x^856+856x^855+855x^854+854x^853+853x^852+852x^851+851x^850+850x^849+849x^848+848x^847+847x^846+846x^845+845x^844+844x^843+843x^842+842x^841+841x^840+840x^839+839x^838+838x^837+837x^836+836x^835+835x^834+834x^833+833x^832+832x^831+831x^830+830x^829+829x^828+828x^827+827x^826+826x^825+825x^824+824x^823+823x^822+822x^821+821x^820+820x^819+819x^818+818x^817+817x^816+816x^815+815x^814+814x^813+813x^812+812x^811+811x^810+810x^809+809x^808+808x^807+807x^806+806x^805+805x^804+804x^803+803x^802+802x^801+801x^800+800x^799+799x^798+798x^797+797x^796+796x^795+795x^794+794x^793+793x^792+792x^791+791x^790+790x^789+789x^788+788x^787+787x^786+786x^785+785x^784+784x^783+783x^782+782x^781+781x^780+780x^779+779x^778+778x^777+777x^776+776x^775+775x^774+774x^773+773x^772+772x^771+771x^770+770x^769+769x^768+768x^767+767x^766+766x^765+765x^764+764x^763+763x^762+762x^761+761x^760+760x^759+759x^758+758x^757+757x^756+756x^755+755x^754+754x^753+753x^752+752x^751+751x^750+750x^749+749x^748+748x^747+747x^746+746x^745+745x^744+744x^743+743x^742+742x^741+741x^740+740x^739+739x^738+738x^737+737x^736+736x^735+735x^734+734x^733+733x^732+732x^731+731x^730+730x^729+729x^728+728x^727+727x^726+726x^725+725x^724+724x^723+723x^722+722x^721+721x^720+720x^719+719x^718+718x^717+717x^716+716x^715+715x^714+714x^713+713x^712+712x^711+711x^710+710x^709+709x^708+708x^707+707x^706+706x^705+705x^704+704x^703+703x^702+702x^701+701x^700+700x^699+699x^698+698x^697+697x^696+696x^695+695x^694+694x^693+693x^692+692x^691+691x^690+690x^689+689x^688+688x^687+687x^686+686x^685+685x^684+684x^683+683x^682+682x^681+681x^680+680x^679+679x^678+678x^677+677x^676+676x^675+675x^674+674x^673+673x^672+672x^671+671x^670+670x^669+669x^668+668x^667+667x^666+666x^665+665x^664+664x^663+663x^662+662x^661+661x^660+660x^659+659x^658+658x^657+657x^656+656x^655+655x^654+654x^653+653x^652+652x^651+651x^650+650x^649+649x^648+648x^647+647x^646+646x^645+645x^644+644x^643+643x^642+642x^641+641x^640+640x^639+639x^638+638x^637+637x^636+636x^635+635x^634+634x^633+633x^632+632x^631+631x^630+630x^629+629x^628+628x^627+627x^626+626x^625+625x^624+624x^623+623x^622+622x^621+621x^620+620x^619+619x^618+618x^617+617x^616+616x^615+615x^614+614x^613+613x^612+612x^611+611x^610+610x^609+609x^608+608x^607+607x^606+606x^605+605x^604+604x^603+603x^602+602x^601+601x^600+600x^599+599x^598+598x^597+597x^596+596x^595+595x^594+594x^593+593x^592+592x^591+591x^590+590x^589+589x^588+588x^587+587x^586+586x^585+585x^584+584x^583+583x^582+582x^581+581x^580+580x^579+579x^578+578x^577+577x^576+576x^575+575x^574+574x^573+573x^572+572x^571+571x^570+570x^569+569x^568+568x^567+567x^566+566x^565+565x^564+564x^563+563x^562+562x^561+561x^560+560x^559+559x^558+558x^557+557x^556+556x^555+555x^554+554x^553+553x^552+552x^551+551x^550+550x^549+549x^548+548x^547+547x^546+546x^545+545x^544+544x^543+543x^542+542x^541+541x^540+540x^539+539x^538+538x^537+537x^536+536x^535+535x^534+534x^533+533x^532+532x^531+531x^530+530x^529+529x^528+528x^527+527x^526+526x^525+525x^524+524x^523+523x^522+522x^521+521x^520+520x^519+519x^518+518x^517+517x^516+516x^515+515x^514+514x^513+513x^512+512x^511+511x^510+510x^509+509x^508+508x^507+507x^506+506x^505+505x^504+504x^503+503x^502+502x^501+501x^500+500x^499+499x^498+498x^497+497x^496+496x^495+495x^494+494x^493+493x^492+492x^491+491x^490+490x^489+489x^488+488x^487+487x^486+486x^485+485x^484+484x^483+483x^482+482x^481+481x^480+480x^479+479x^478+478x^477+477x^476+476x^475+475x^474+474x^473+473x^472+472x^471+471x^470+470x^469+469x^468+468x^467+467x^466+466x^465+465x^464+464x^463+463x^462+462x^461+461x^460+460x^459+459x^458+458x^457+457x^456+456x^455+455x^454+454x^453+453x^452+452x^451+451x^450+450x^449+449x^448+448x^447+447x^446+446x^445+445x^444+444x^443+443x^442+442x^441+441x^440+440x^439+439x^438+438x^437+437x^436+436x^435+435x^434+434x^433+433x^432+432x^431+431x^430+430x^429+429x^428+428x^427+427x^426+426x^425+425x^424+424x^423+423x^422+422x^421+421x^420+420x^419+419x^418+418x^417+417x^416+416x^415+415x^414+414x^413+413x^412+412x^411+411x^410+410x^409+409x^408+408x^407+407x^406+406x^405+405x^404+404x^403+403x^402+402x^401+401x^400+400x^399+399x^398+398x^397+397x^396+396x^395+395x^394+394x^393+393x^392+392x^391+391x^390+390x^389+389x^388+388x^387+387x^386+386x^385+385x^384+384x^383+383x^382+382x^381+381x^380+380x^379+379x^378+378x^377+377x^376+376x^375+375x^374+374x^373+373x^372+372x^371+371x^370+370x^369+369x^368+368x^367+367x^366+366x^365+365x^364+364x^363+363x^362+362x^361+361x^360+360x^359+359x^358+358x^357+357x^356+356x^355+355x^354+354x^353+353x^352+352x^351+351x^350+350x^349+349x^348+348x^347+347x^346+346x^345+345x^344+344x^343+343x^342+342x^341+341x^340+340x^339+339x^338+338x^337+337x^336+336x^335+335x^334+334x^333+333x^332+332x^331+331x^330+330x^329+329x^328+328x^327+327x^326+326x^325+325x^324+324x^323+323x^322+322x^321+321x^320+320x^319+319x^318+318x^317+317x^316+316x^315+315x^314+314x^313+313x^312+312x^311+311x^310+310x^309+309x^308+308x^307+307x^306+306x^305+305x^304+304x^303+303x^302+302x^301+301x^300+300x^299+299x^298+298x^297+297x^296+296x^295+295x^294+294x^293+293x^292+292x^291+291x^290+290x^289+289x^288+288x^287+287x^286+286x^285+285x^284+284x^283+283x^282+282x^281+281x^280+280x^279+279x^278+278x^277+277x^276+276x^275+275x^274+274x^273+273x^272+272x^271+271x^270+270x^269+269x^268+268x^267+267x^266+266x^265+265x^264+264x^263+263x^262+262x^261+261x^260+260x^259+259x^258+258x^257+257x^256+256x^255+255x^254+254x^253+253x^252+252x^251+251x^250+250x^249+249x^248+248x^247+247x^246+246x^245+245x^244+244x^243+243x^242+242x^241+241x^240+240x^239+239x^238+238x^237+237x^236+236x^235+235x^234+234x^233+233x^232+232x^231+231x^230+230x^229+229x^228+228x^227+227x^226+226x^225+225x^224+224x^223+223x^222+222x^221+221x^220+220x^219+219x^218+218x^217+217x^216+216x^215+215x^214+214x^213+213x^212+212x^211+211x^210+210x^209+209x^208+208x^207+207x^206+206x^205+205x^204+204x^203+203x^202+202x^201+201x^200+200x^199+199x^198+198x^197+197x^196+196x^195+195x^194+194x^193+193x^192+192x^191+191x^190+190x^189+189x^188+188x^187+187x^186+186x^185+185x^184+184x^183+183x^182+182x^181+181x^180+180x^179+179x^178+178x^177+177x^176+176x^175+175x^174+174x^173+173x^172+172x^171+171x^170+170x^169+169x^168+168x^167+167x^166+166x^165+165x^164+164x^163+163x^162+162x^161+161x^160+160x^159+159x^158+158x^157+157x^156+156x^155+155x^154+154x^153+153x^152+152x^151+151x^150+150x^149+149x^148+148x^147+147x^146+146x^145+145x^144+144x^143+143x^142+142x^141+141x^140+140x^139+139x^138+138x^137+137x^136+136x^135+135x^134+134x^133+133x^132+132x^131+131x^130+130x^129+129x^128+128x^127+127x^126+126x^125+125x^124+124x^123+123x^122+122x^121+121x^120+120x^119+119x^118+118x^117+117x^116+116x^115+115x^114+114x^113+113x^112+112x^111+111x^110+110x^109+109x^108+108x^107+107x^106+106x^105+105x^104+104x^103+103x^102+102x^101+101x^100+100x^99+99x^98+98x^97+97x^96+96x^95+95x^94+94x^93+93x^92+92x^91+91x^90+90x^89+89x^88+88x^87+87x^86+86x^85+85x^84+84x^83+83x^82+82x^81+81x^80+80x^79+79x^78+78x^77+77x^76+76x^75+75x^74+74x^73+73x^72+72x^71+71x^70+70x^69+69x^68+68x^67+67x^66+66x^65+65x^64+64x^63+63x^62+62x^61+61x^60+60x^59+59x^58+58x^57+57x^56+56x^55+55x^54+54x^53+53x^52+52x^51+51x^50+50x^49+49x^48+48x^47+47x^46+46x^45+45x^44+44x^43+43x^42+42x^41+41x^40+40x^39+39x^38+38x^37+37x^36+36x^35+35x^34+34x^33+33x^32+32x^31+31x^30+30x^29+29x^28+28x^27+27x^26+26x^25+25x^24+24x^23+23x^22+22x^21+21x^20+20x^19+19x^18+18x^17+17x^16+16x^15+15x^14+14x^13+13x^12+12x^11+11x^10+10x^9+9x^8+8x^7+7x^6+6x^5+5x^4+4x^3+3x^2+2x^1+1
Term / Capacity of b : 1000 1280
3. copy constructor test
3-1) normal copy
h (created from f) = -4x^3+2.3x^2-3
Term / Capacity of h : 3 10
3-2) empty copy
k = 0
Term / Capacity of k : 0 10
4. assignment operator test
4-1) normal assignment
h (assigned from g) = 2x^5+3x^4+1x^2
Term / Capacity of h : 3 10
4-2) empty assignment
e2 = 0
Term / Capacity of e2 : 0 10
5. Add test
5-1) assignment add (add 4x^3 to g for test temporarily)
f = -4x^3+2.3x^2-3
g = 2x^5+3x^4+4x^3+1x^2
f + g = 2x^5+3x^4+3.3x^2-3
Term / Capacity of h : 4 10
5-2) copy add
(copy) f + g = 2x^5+3x^4-4x^3+3.3x^2-3
Term / Capacity of t1 : 5 10
5-3) add empty + polynomial
e + f = -4x^3+2.3x^2-3
Term / Capacity of h : 3 10
f + e = -4x^3+2.3x^2-3
Term / Capacity of h : 3 10
5-4) add empty + empty
e + e2 = 0
Term / Capacity of h : 0 10
5-5) add capacity test
a + a2 = 1x^21+1x^20+1x^19+1x^18+1x^17+1x^16+1x^15+1x^14+1x^13+1x^12+1x^11+1x^10+1x^9+1x^8+1x^7+1x^6+1x^5+1x^4+1x^3+1x^2+1x^1+1
Term / Capacity of h : 22 40
6. Subtract test(add -4x^3 to g for test temporarily)
6-1) assignment subtract
f = -4x^3+2.3x^2-3
g = 2x^5+3x^4-4x^3+1x^2
f - g = -2x^5-3x^4+1.3x^2-3
Term / Capacity of h : 4 10
6-2) copy subtract
(copy) f - g = -2x^5-3x^4-4x^3+1.3x^2-3
Term / Capacity of t2 : 5 10
6-3) subtract empty and polynomial
e - f = 4x^3-2.3x^2+3
Term / Capacity of h : 3 10
f - e = -4x^3+2.3x^2-3
Term / Capacity of h : 3 10
6-4) empty - empty
e - e2 = 0
Term / Capacity of h : 0 10
6-5) subtract capacity test
a - a2 = -1x^21-1x^20-1x^19-1x^18-1x^17-1x^16-1x^15-1x^14-1x^13-1x^12-1x^11+1x^10+1x^9+1x^8+1x^7+1x^6+1x^5+1x^4+1x^3+1x^2+1x^1+1
Term / Capacity of h : 22 40
7. Multiply test
7-1) assignment multiply
f * g = -8x^8-7.4x^7+6.9x^6-10x^5-6.7x^4-3x^2
Term / Capacity of h : 6 10
7-2) copy multiply
(copy) f * g = -8x^8-7.4x^7+6.9x^6-10x^5-6.7x^4-3x^2
Term / Capacity of t3 : 6 10
7-3) multiply empty and polynomial
e * f = 0
Term / Capacity of h : 0 10
f * e = 0
Term / Capacity of h : 0 10
7-4) empty * empty
e * e2 = 0
Term / Capacity of h : 0 10
7-5) multiply capacity test
a * a = 1x^20+2x^19+3x^18+4x^17+5x^16+6x^15+7x^14+8x^13+9x^12+10x^11+11x^10+10x^9+9x^8+8x^7+7x^6+6x^5+5x^4+4x^3+3x^2+2x^1+1
Term / Capacity of h : 21 40
8. Equal test
f and g are different
f and h are same
a and a3 are different
e and e2 are same
e and f are different
9. Eval test
f(3.5) is -146.325
e(3.5) is 0
10. Derivative test
10-1) normal
Derivative of f = -12x^2+4.6x^1
10-2) only x^1
Derivative of i2(4x^1) = 4
10-3) only const
Derivative of i4(const : 5) = 0
10-4) empty
Derivative of e = 0
